description: This table contains information about the program that a pharmacy claim is associated with.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROGRAM_ID
columns.description: This item contains the external ID of a Value Based Program record or records representing the programs that the claim is associated with.

columns.name: PROGRAM_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the program record.

columns.name: CLAIM_PROG_LINK_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the current status of the Value Based Program, whether it is active, inactive, or planned to be removed (loaded in error).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive


Removed

columns.name: PROGRAM_MOD_DTTM
columns.description: The local instant when the claim was last modified for the Value Based Plan.

columns.name: PROGRAM_MOD_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC instant when the claim was last modified for the Value Based Plan.
